main_definition: To be without or deficient in something; to not possess or have enough of.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Missing an essential quality or attribute
meanings_and_examples.example: His lack of confidence often held him back from pursuing his goals.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Not having a sufficient amount or number of something
meanings_and_examples.example: The project lacks the necessary resources to be completed on time.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Having insufficient quantity, quality, or degree
meanings_and_examples.example: Her lack of experience in coding made it difficult for her to understand programming concepts.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Failing to meet a certain expectation or standard
meanings_and_examples.example: The presentation lacked the proper structure and clarity as expected from an experienced speaker.
